translation:
Reserved

Most Illustrious Sir

For the good of the service of the State, it is incumbent upon Messrs. Prados, officers of the distinguished Division to the husband of Your Lordship Manuel José Ferreira, who has attempted the seduction of soldiers, who tell me they assert to people residing here.

God keep Your Lordship Secretary of State for the Affairs of Justice in Caçapava, February 28, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Commander of the Right Division.
